場内放送: (じょうないほうそう) - (announcement over) the public address system (e.g. in stadium)
場合が場合だから: (ばあいがばあいだから) - given the circumstances; such being the case
場合によって: (ばあいによって) - depending on the situation; should time and circumstances permit
場合による: (ばあいによる) - to depend (on the situation); to be handled case by case
場合に応じて: (ばあいにおうじて) - in accordance with the situation
場合の数: (ばあいのかず) - number of possible outcomes; number of ways (e.g. of arranging something)
場合を除き: (ばあいをのぞき) - excluding the case when; when not
場外: (じょうがい) - (ant: 場内) outside the hall (or stadium, market, etc.); off the grounds; off the premises; off-track
場外乱闘: (じょうがいらんとう) - brawl outside the stadium; fighting outside ring (wrestling); ring-side battle
場外取引: (ばがいとりひき) - (yoji) over-the-counter trading; OTC trading; off-floor trading
場外市場: (ばがいしじょう) - (yoji) over-the-counter market; OTC market
場外馬券: (じょうがいばけん) - off-track betting
場当たり: (ばあたり) - playing to the gallery/grandstanding/gag/claptrap; ad hoc/haphazard; dress rehearsal
場当り: (ばあたり) - playing to the gallery/grandstanding/gag/claptrap; ad hoc/haphazard; dress rehearsal
場慣れ: (ばなれ) - experience; being accustomed (to something); poise in a critical situation
場所: (basho) - lugar, local, ponto, posição; quarto, espaço; lugar, local, ponto, posição; quarto, espaço; basho
場所もあろうに: (ばしょもあろうに) - of all places
場所を取る: (ばしょをとる) - to take up space; to occupy space
場所代: (ばしょだい) - venue cost; venue fee
場所入: (ばしょいり) - {sumo} arrival of the wrestlers to the tournament venue
場所布団: (ばしょぶとん) - {sumo} waiting wrestler's sitting cushion
場所手当: (ばしょてあて) - {sumo} allowance for non-salaried wrestlers during tournaments
場所柄: (ばしょがら) - character of a place; situation; location; occasion
場所柄弁えず: (ばしょがらわきまえず) - not in keeping with the occasion
場数を踏む: (ばかずをふむ) - to gain experience; to get accustomed (with something)
場末: (ばすえ) - outskirts (e.g. of a shopping district); rundown district
場立ち: (ばたち) - floor broker (stock exchange); floor trader; boardman
場繋ぎ: (ばつなぎ) - filling in (e.g. between speakers at a meeting, acts at a show); material used to fill in (between speeches at a meeting, etc.); anecdote
場違い: (ばちがい) - out-of-place; inappropriate; sticking out like a sore thumb
場面場面: (ばめんばめん) - (often as 場面場面で)  (in) various settings; act to act; place to place
場面転換: (ばめんてんかん) - scene change; cutaway; cut
場風: (ばかぜ) - {mahj}  tiles matching the round wind
場風牌: (ばかぜはい) - {mahj}  tiles matching the round wind
場馴れ: (ばなれ) - experience; being accustomed (to something); poise in a critical situation
塀を巡らす: (へいをめぐらす) - to fence in; to surround with a wall
塀越し: (へいごし) - over a wall; crossing a fence
塁: (rui) - bases, base, bolsa, saco; fortaleza, reduto
塁に出る: (るいにでる) - {baseb} to get on base
塁を守る: (るいをまもる) - to defend a fort
塊: (kai/katamari) - clod , lump, mass, bundle, clump, clod, cluster; group, crowd; embodiment (of an idea, quality, feeling etc.), personification
塊まり: (かたまり) - lump/mass/bundle/clump/clod/cluster; group/crowd; embodiment (of an idea, quality, feeling etc.)/personification
塊炭: (かいたん) - lump charcoal; lump coal
塒を巻く: (とぐろをまく) - to coil itself (e.g. a snake); to loaf around
塒を解く: (とぐろをほどく) - to uncoil itself
塔中: (たっちゅう) - sub-temple, esp. a Zen one founded to commemorate the death of a high priest
塔屋: (とうおく) - rooftop structure, e.g. tower, elevator machine room, etc.
塔頭: (たっちゅう) - sub-temple, esp. a Zen one founded to commemorate the death of a high priest
塗りたくる: (ぬりたくる) - to bedaub (with paint); to besmear; to paint heavily; to spread thickly
塗りつける: (ぬりつける) - to daub; to smear
塗りつぶし: (ぬりつぶし) - blotting out; fill (in graphics)
塗りつぶす: (ぬりつぶす) - to paint over; to paint out
塗り付ける: (ぬりつける) - to daub; to smear
塗り分ける: (ぬりわける) - to paint in different colors (for different purposes) (colours)
塗り固める: (ぬりかためる) - to coat a surface with something that adheres strongly when hardened (i.e. grout, plaster, lacquer)
塗り壁: (ぬりかべ) - plaster or mortar-covered wall
塗り広げる: (ぬりひろげる) - to spread; to apply
塗り替える: (ぬりかえる) - to repaint/to paint again; to break (a record)/to rewrite/to remake
塗り板: (ぬりいた) - (塗り板 is now obs.)  blackboard; (ぬりいた only) board used for laquering
塗り潰し: (ぬりつぶし) - blotting out; fill (in graphics)
塗り潰す: (ぬりつぶす) - to paint over; to paint out
塗り直し: (ぬりなおし) - re-coating (e.g. repainting, respraying, etc.)
